text: Pichai Sundararajan (born June 10, 1972), also known as Sundar Pichai, is an Indian-American business executive. He was born in Madurai, Tamil Nadu, India. Pichai became the chief executive officer (CEO) of Google Inc. on October 2, 2015. Four years later after being appointed as the CEO of Google he was made CEO of Alphabet as well which is the parent company of Google. ==References== Category:Google Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American billionaires Category:Businesspeople from California Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Tamil Nadu
title: Sundar Pichai
